properties.Description: The properties of a configure alert request.

sendToOwners.Description: A value indicating whether to send email to subscription administrator.

customEmailAddresses.Description: The custom email address for sending emails.

locale.Description: The locale for the email notification.

rolloverEncryptionDetails.Description: Rollover encryption details for the fabric.

containerIds.Description: The container Ids for the Azure fabric.

vmwareSiteId.Description: The ARM Id of the VMware site.

physicalSiteId.Description: The ARM Id of the physical site.

migrationSolutionId.Description: The ARM Id of the migration solution.

processServers.Description: The list of Process Servers associated with the fabric.

masterTargetServers.Description: The list of Master Target servers associated with the fabric.

runAsAccounts.Description: The list of run as accounts created on the server.

replicationPairCount.Description: The number of replication pairs configured in this CS.

agentCount.Description: The number of source and target servers configured to talk to this CS.

systemLoad.Description: The percentage of the system load.

cpuLoad.Description: The percentage of the CPU load.

lastHeartbeat.Description: The last heartbeat received from CS server.

ipAddress.Description: The IP address of the server.

osType.Description: The OS type of the server.

agentVersion.Description: The version of the scout component on the server.

lastHeartbeat.Description: The last heartbeat received from the server.

mobilityServiceUpdates.Description: The list of the mobility service updates available on the Process Server.

machineCount.Description: The servers configured with this PS.

replicationPairCount.Description: The number of replication pairs configured in this PS.

systemLoad.Description: The percentage of the system load.

cpuLoad.Description: The percentage of the CPU load.

sslCertExpiryDate.Description: The PS SSL cert expiry date.

osVersion.Description: OS Version of the process server. Note: This will get populated if user has CS version greater than 9.12.0.0.

version.Description: The version of the latest update.

rebootStatus.Description: The reboot status of the update - whether it is required or not.

innerHealthErrors.Description: The inner health errors. HealthError having a list of HealthError as child errors is problematic. InnerHealthError is used because this will prevent an infinite loop of structures when Hydra tries to auto-generate the contract. We are exposing the related health errors as inner health errors and all API consumers can utilize this in the same fashion as Exception -> InnerException.

status.Description: A value indicating whether security update required.

ipAddress.Description: The IP address of the server.

osType.Description: The OS type of the server.

agentVersion.Description: The version of the scout component on the server.

lastHeartbeat.Description: The last heartbeat received from the server.

retentionVolumes.Description: The retention volumes of Master target Server.

dataStores.Description: The list of data stores in the fabric.

diskCount.Description: Disk count of the master target.

osVersion.Description: OS Version of the master target.

freeSpaceInBytes.Description: The free space available in this volume.

symbolicName.Description: The symbolic name of data store.

capacity.Description: The capacity of data store in GBs.

freeSpace.Description: The free space of data store in GBs.

kekState.Description: The key encryption key state for the Vmm.

kekCertThumbprint.Description: The key encryption key certificate thumbprint.

kekCertExpiryDate.Description: The key encryption key certificate expiry date.

properties.Description: Input properties for creating network mapping.

state.Description: The pairing state for network mapping.

primaryNetworkId.Description: The primary network id for network mapping.

providerSpecificInput.Description: Provider specific inputs for container creation.

pairingStatus.Description: The pairing status of this cloud.

instanceType.Description: Gets the class type. Overridden in derived classes.

policyFriendlyName.Description: The name of policy governing this item.

lastTestMigrationStatus.Description: The status of the last test migration.

allowedOperations.Description: The allowed operations on the migration item, based on the current migration state of the item.

eventCorrelationId.Description: The correlation Id for events associated with this migration item.

vmwareMachineId.Description: The ARM Id of the VM discovered in VMware.

dataMoverRunAsAccountId.Description: The data mover RunAs account Id.

targetResourceGroupId.Description: The target resource group ARM Id.

targetAvailabilitySetId.Description: The target availability set ARM Id.

targetBootDiagnosticsStorageAccountId.Description: The target boot diagnostics storage account ARM Id.

performAutoResync.Description: A value indicating whether auto resync is to be done.

osType.Description: The type of the OS on the VM.

migrationRecoveryPointId.Description: The recovery point Id to which the VM was migrated.

lastRecoveryPointReceived.Description: The last recovery point received time.

resyncRequired.Description: A value indicating whether resync is required.

isOSDisk.Description: A value indicating whether the disk is the OS disk.

logStorageAccountId.Description: The log storage account ARM Id.

logStorageAccountSasSecretName.Description: The key vault secret name of the log storage account.

isOSDisk.Description: A value indicating whether the disk is the OS disk.

logStorageAccountId.Description: The log storage account ARM Id.

logStorageAccountSasSecretName.Description: The key vault secret name of the log storage account.

seedManagedDiskId.Description: The ARM Id of the seed managed disk.

targetManagedDiskId.Description: The ARM Id of the target managed disk.

isPrimaryNic.Description: A value indicating whether this is the primary NIC.

isSelectedForMigration.Description: A value indicating whether this NIC is selected for migration.

jobId.Description: The ARM Id of the job being executed.

startTime.Description: The start time of the job.

providerSpecificDetails.Description: The ReplicationProviderInput. For HyperVReplicaAzure provider, it will be AzureEnableProtectionInput object. For San provider, it will be SanEnableProtectionInput object. For HyperVReplicaAzure provider, it can be null.

protectedItemType.Description: The type of protected item type.

primaryFabricFriendlyName.Description: The friendly name of the primary fabric.

primaryFabricProvider.Description: The fabric provider of the primary fabric.

recoveryFabricFriendlyName.Description: The friendly name of recovery fabric.

recoveryFabricId.Description: The Arm Id of recovery fabric.

primaryProtectionContainerFriendlyName.Description: The name of primary protection container friendly name.

recoveryProtectionContainerFriendlyName.Description: The name of recovery container friendly name.

activeLocation.Description: The Current active location of the PE.

allowedOperations.Description: The allowed operations on the Replication protected item.

replicationHealth.Description: The consolidated protection health for the VM taking any issues with SRS as well as all the replication units associated with the VM's replication group into account. This is a string representation of the ProtectionHealth enumeration.

failoverHealth.Description: The consolidated failover health for the VM.

policyFriendlyName.Description: The name of Policy governing this PE.

lastSuccessfulTestFailoverTime.Description: The Last successful test failover time.

failoverRecoveryPointId.Description: The recovery point ARM Id to which the Vm was failed over.

fabricObjectId.Description: The fabric specific object Id of the virtual machine.

recoveryResourceGroupId.Description: The recovery resource group Id. Valid for V2 scenarios.

recoveryCloudServiceId.Description: The recovery cloud service Id. Valid for V1 scenarios.

vmDisks.Description: The list of vm disk details.

vmManagedDisks.Description: The list of vm managed disk details.

multiVmGroupCreateOption.Description: Whether Multi VM group is auto created or specified by user.

protectedManagedDisks.Description: The list of protected managed disks.

recoveryAzureVMSize.Description: The size of recovery virtual machine.

recoveryAzureVMName.Description: The name of recovery virtual machine.

monitoringPercentageCompletion.Description: The percentage of the monitoring job. The type of the monitoring job is defined by MonitoringJobType property.

monitoringJobType.Description: The type of the monitoring job. The progress is contained in MonitoringPercentageCompletion property.

lastHeartbeat.Description: The last heartbeat received from the source server.

isReplicationAgentUpdateRequired.Description: A value indicating whether replication agent update is required.

vmProtectionState.Description: The protection state for the vm.

vmProtectionStateDescription.Description: The protection state description for the vm.

lifecycleId.Description: An id associated with the PE that survives actions like switch protection which change the backing PE/CPE objects internally.The lifecycle id gets carried forward to have a link/continuity in being able to have an Id that denotes the "same" protected item even though other internal Ids/ARM Id might be changing.

testFailoverRecoveryFabricObjectId.Description: The test failover fabric object Id.

rpoInSeconds.Description: The last RPO value in seconds.

lastRpoCalculatedTime.Description: The time (in UTC) when the last RPO value was calculated by Protection Service.

recoveryAzureStorageAccountId.Description: The recovery VHD storage account Id.

primaryStagingAzureStorageAccountId.Description: The primary staging storage account Id.
The primary staging storage account Arm Id.

recoveryResourceGroupId.Description: The target resource group Arm Id.

recoveryReplicaDiskAccountType.Description: The replica disk type. Its an optional value and will be same as source disk type if not user provided.

recoveryTargetDiskAccountType.Description: The target disk type after failover. Its an optional value and will be same as source disk type if not user provided.

diskEncryptionKeyInfo.Description: The recovery KeyVault reference for secret.

keyEncryptionKeyInfo.Description: The recovery KeyVault reference for key.

keyVaultResourceArmId.Description: The KeyVault resource ARM id for secret.
The KeyVault resource ARM id for key.

resyncRequired.Description: A value indicating whether resync is required for this disk.

monitoringPercentageCompletion.Description: The percentage of the monitoring job. The type of the monitoring job is defined by MonitoringJobType property.

monitoringJobType.Description: The type of the monitoring job. The progress is contained in MonitoringPercentageCompletion property.

dataPendingInStagingStorageAccountInMB.Description: The data pending for replication in MB at staging account.

dataPendingAtSourceAgentInMB.Description: The data pending at source virtual machine in MB.

isDiskEncrypted.Description: A value indicating whether vm has encrypted os disk or not.

dekKeyVaultArmId.Description: The KeyVault resource id for secret (BEK).

isDiskKeyEncrypted.Description: A value indicating whether disk key got encrypted or not.

kekKeyVaultArmId.Description: The KeyVault resource id for key (KEK).

recoveryResourceGroupId.Description: The recovery disk resource group Arm Id.

recoveryNicIpAddressType.Description: IP allocation type for recovery VM.

enableAcceleratedNetworkingOnRecovery.Description: A value indicating whether the NIC has accelerated networking enabled.

id.Description: The ARM Id of the role assignment.

name.Description: The name of the role assignment.

osType.Description: The OS type associated with vm.

vhdId.Description: The OS disk VHD id associated with vm.

targetAzureNetworkId.Description: The selected target Azure network Id.

targetAzureSubnetId.Description: The selected target Azure subnet Id.

enableRdpOnTargetOption.Description: The selected option to enable RDP\SSH on target vm after failover. String value of {SrsDataContract.EnableRDPOnTargetOption} enum.

logStorageAccountId.Description: The storage account to be used for logging during replication.

disksToInclude.Description: The list of VHD IDs of disks to be protected.

targetAzureV2ResourceGroupId.Description: The Id of the target resource group (for resource manager deployment) in which the failover VM is to be created.

useManagedDisks.Description: A value indicating whether managed disks should be used during failover.

recoveryAzureLogStorageAccountId.Description: The ARM id of the log storage account used for replication. This will be set to null if no log storage account was provided during enable protection.

vmProtectionStateDescription.Description: The protection state description for the vm.

selectedRecoveryAzureNetworkId.Description: The selected recovery azure network Id.

selectedSourceNicId.Description: The selected source nic Id which will be used as the primary nic during failover.

sourceVmRamSizeInMB.Description: The RAM size of the VM on the primary side.

sourceVmCpuCount.Description: The CPU count of the VM on the primary side.

licenseType.Description: License Type of the VM to be used.

targetDiskLocation.Description: Blob uri of the Azure disk.

lunId.Description: Ordinal\LunId of the disk for the Azure VM.

retentionDrive.Description: The retention drive to use on the MT.

activeSiteType.Description: The active location of the VM. If the VM is being protected from Azure, this field will take values from { Azure, OnPrem }. If the VM is being protected between two data-centers, this field will be OnPrem always.

sourceVmCpuCount.Description: The CPU count of the VM on the primary side.

sourceVmRamSizeInMB.Description: The RAM size of the VM on the primary side.

vmProtectionState.Description: The protection state for the vm.

volumeOptions.Description: The volume label based option for disk exclusion.

volumeLabel.Description: The volume label. The disk having any volume with this label will be excluded from replication.

onlyExcludeIfSingleVolume.Description: The value indicating whether to exclude multi volume disk or not. If a disk has multiple volumes and one of the volume has label matching with VolumeLabel this disk will be excluded from replication if OnlyExcludeIfSingleVolume is false.

diskSignature.Description: The guest signature of disk to be excluded from replication.

healthErrorCode.Description: The health error code for the disk.

multiVmSyncStatus.Description: A value indicating whether multi-VM sync has to be enabled.

id.Description: The ARM Id of the recovery plan protected item.

eventCode.Description: The Id of the monitoring event.

eventType.Description: The type of the event. for example: VM Health, Server Health, Job Failure etc.

affectedObjectFriendlyName.Description: The friendly name of the source of the event on which it is raised (for example, VM, VMM etc).

affectedObjectCorrelationId.Description: The affected object correlationId for the event.

timeOfOccurrence.Description: The time of occurrence of the event.

fabricId.Description: The ARM ID of the fabric.

healthErrors.Description: The list of errors / warnings capturing details associated with the issue(s).

correctiveAction.Description: Corrective Action string for the event.

jobId.Description: Job arm id for the event.

networkVirtualizationStatus.Description: A value indicating whether Network Virtualization is enabled for the logical network.

logicalNetworkUsage.Description: A value indicating whether logical network is used as private test network by test failover.

logicalNetworkDefinitionsStatus.Description: A value indicating whether logical network definitions are isolated.

addressList.Description: The list of addresses for the subnet.

replicationProtectedItemId.Description: The ARM resource of protected items.

supportedReplicationProviders.Description: The list of replication providers supported for the protectable item.

sourceItemId.Description: The source id of the object.

generation.Description: The id of the object in fabric.

hasPhysicalDisk.Description: A value indicating whether the VM has a physical disk attached. String value of {SrsDataContract.PresenceStatus} enum.

hasFibreChannelAdapter.Description: A value indicating whether the VM has a fibre channel adapter attached. String value of {SrsDataContract.PresenceStatus} enum.

hasSharedVhd.Description: A value indicating whether the VM has a shared VHD attached. String value of {SrsDataContract.PresenceStatus} enum.

Gets the class type. Overridden in derived classes.

agentGeneratedId.Description: The ID generated by the InMage agent after it gets installed on guest. This is the ID to be used during InMage CreateProtection.

agentInstalled.Description: The value indicating if InMage scout agent is installed on guest.

poweredOn.Description: The value indicating whether VM is powered on.

discoveryType.Description: A value indicating the discovery type of the machine. Value can be vCenter or physical.

instanceType.Description: Gets the class type. Overridden in derived classes.

diskType.Description: Whether disk is system disk or data disk.

diskConfiguration.Description: Whether disk is dynamic disk or basic disk.

sourceItemId.Description: The source id of the object.

generation.Description: The id of the object in fabric.

hasPhysicalDisk.Description: A value indicating whether the VM has a physical disk attached. String value of {SrsDataContract.PresenceStatus} enum.

hasFibreChannelAdapter.Description: A value indicating whether the VM has a fibre channel adapter attached. String value of {SrsDataContract.PresenceStatus} enum.

hasSharedVhd.Description: A value indicating whether the VM has a shared VHD attached. String value of {SrsDataContract.PresenceStatus} enum.

instanceType.Description: Gets the class type. Overridden in derived classes.

recoveryPointType.Description: The recovery point type: ApplicationConsistent, CrashConsistent.

providerSpecificDetails.Description: The provider specific details for the recovery point.

recoveryPointSyncType.Description: A value indicating whether the recovery point is multi VM consistent.

isMultiVmSyncPoint.Description: A value indicating whether the recovery point is multi VM consistent.

friendlyName.Description: Friendly name of the Storage classification.

state.Description: The status of the Job. It is one of these values - NotStarted, InProgress, Succeeded, Failed, Cancelled, Suspended or Other.

stateDescription.Description: The description of the state of the Job. For e.g. - For Succeeded state, description can be Completed, PartiallySucceeded, CompletedWithInformation or Skipped.

targetObjectName.Description: The name of the affected object.

targetInstanceType.Description: The type of the affected object which is of {Microsoft.Azure.SiteRecovery.V2015_11_10.AffectedObjectType} class.

customDetails.Description: The custom job details like test failover job details.

allowedActions.Description: The state/actions applicable on this task.

state.Description: The State. It is one of these values - NotStarted, InProgress, Succeeded, Failed, Cancelled, Suspended or Other.

stateDescription.Description: The description of the task state. For example - For Succeeded state, description can be Completed, PartiallySucceeded, CompletedWithInformation or Skipped.

taskType.Description: The type of task. Details in CustomDetails property depend on this type.

customDetails.Description: The custom task details based on the task type.

groupTaskCustomDetails.Description: The custom task details based on the task type, if the task type is GroupTaskDetails or one of the types derived from it.

cloudServiceName.Description: The cloud service of the automation runbook account.

subscriptionId.Description: The subscription Id of the automation runbook account.

accountName.Description: The automation account name of the runbook.

jobId.Description: The job Id of the runbook execution.

jobOutput.Description: The execution output of the runbook.

isPrimarySideScript.Description: A value indicating whether it is a primary side script or not.

vmDetails.Description: The list of inconsistent Vm details.

details.Description: The list of details regarding state of the Protected Entity in SRS and On prem.

jobScenarioName.Description: The job name. Enum type ScenarioName.

isPrimarySideScript.Description: A value indicating whether it is a primary side script or not.

workflowIds.Description: The list of child workflow ids.

creationTime.Description: The creation time of job error.

possibleCauses.Description: The possible causes for the error.

recommendedAction.Description: The recommended action to resolve the error.

affectedObjectDetails.Description: The affected object properties like source server, source cloud, target server, target cloud etc. based on the workflow object details.

instanceType.Description: Gets the type of job details (see JobDetailsTypes enum for possible values).

sasToken.Description: The sas token to access blob.

newReplicationProtectedItemId.Description: ARM Id of the new replication protected item.

networkType.Description: The test network type (see TestFailoverInput enum for possible values).
